page.title: 19Health and Disease
page.content: There are five doctors in South Molton. Also we have a cottage hospital and a surgery. Most people were born in a hospital. We asked 150 children in our school about the diseases they have had. The most common illness was chicken pox with 77. Next came measles with 72, mumps with 40, flu with 29, whooping cough with 27, slap face syndrome with 23, earache with 20, tonsilitus with 13, sore throat with 6, tummy bug with 4, hay fever with 3. The nearest big hospital is in Barnstaple. You would go there for an x_ray and also bad injuries. You would go to South Molton hospital for illness and minor injuries.
